column5: he; him (used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant); (used before sb's name for emphasis); (used as a meaningless mock object); (literary) other
column7: to unfold; to spread out; to open up; to launch; to carry out
column9: (completed action marker); (modal particle indicating change of state, situation now); (modal particle intensifying preceding clause)||to finish; to achieve; variant of 了[liǎo]; to understand clearly||(of eyes) bright; clear-sighted; to understand clearly
column11: map; CL:张[zhāng],本[běn]
